Class DeckTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.DeckTest
public class DeckTest extends Object
Test class for the Deck class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    testAppendShufflePick()
    Combination of previous tests
    void
    testAppendToBottom()
    This method is used to test the appendToBottom method in the Deck class It asserts that the deck is not empty It updates the deck by providing another card It asserts that the cardElements of the card added at the bottom is not equal to the cardElements of the card picked from the top
    void
    testDeckConstructorWithCardList()
    This method is used to test the constructor of the Deck class when a card list is provided It asserts that the deck is not empty
    void
    testDeckNonEmpty()
    Test case to verify that the deck is not empty after appending a card to the bottom
    void
    testEmptyDeckConstructor()
    This method is used to test the constructor of the Deck class when an empty deck is created It asserts that the deck is empty
    void
    testIsEmpty()
    Test case to verify if the deck just created is empty
    void
    testPickFromTop()
    This method is used to test the pickFromTop method of the Deck class It creates a deck of resource cards, picks a card from the top and checks if the picked card has the same card element as the first card added to the deck
    void
    testShuffleEmptyDeck()
    This method is used to test the shuffle method of the Deck class when the deck is empty Nothing happens because requirements require non-empty deck
    void
    testShuffleNonEmptyDeck()
    Test case to verify the behavior of the shuffle() method when the deck is non-empty It asserts that the shuffled deck is not equal to the original deck

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • testEmptyDeckConstructor

      @Test public void testEmptyDeckConstructor()
      This method is used to test the constructor of the Deck class when an empty deck is created It asserts that the deck is empty

    • testDeckConstructorWithCardList

      This method is used to test the constructor of the Deck class when a card list is provided It asserts that the deck is not empty

      Test case to verify if the deck just created is empty

    • testDeckNonEmpty

      @Test public void testDeckNonEmpty()
      Test case to verify that the deck is not empty after appending a card to the bottom

    • testPickFromTop

      @Test public void testPickFromTop()
      This method is used to test the pickFromTop method of the Deck class It creates a deck of resource cards, picks a card from the top and checks if the picked card has the same card element as the first card added to the deck

    • testAppendToBottom

      @Test public void testAppendToBottom()
      This method is used to test the appendToBottom method in the Deck class It asserts that the deck is not empty It updates the deck by providing another card It asserts that the cardElements of the card added at the bottom is not equal to the cardElements of the card picked from the top

    • testShuffleEmptyDeck

      @Test public void testShuffleEmptyDeck()
      This method is used to test the shuffle method of the Deck class when the deck is empty Nothing happens because requirements require non-empty deck

    • testShuffleNonEmptyDeck

      @Test public void testShuffleNonEmptyDeck()
      Test case to verify the behavior of the shuffle() method when the deck is non-empty It asserts that the shuffled deck is not equal to the original deck

      @Test public void testAppendShufflePick()
      Combination of previous tests
